committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate the Merced River, California, as a wild and scenic river. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act.
